cart.shipping_taxes_calculated_at_checkout: Shipping and taxes will be calculated at checkout.

customer_dashboard.show_more_orders: Show %{smart_count} more order |||| Show %{smart_count} more orders

forgot_password_form.title: Recover your password
forgot_password_form.instructions: Enter your account's email address and we will send you a password reset link.
forgot_password_form.email_instructions: An email containing a link was sent to you. Click on it to reset your password.

form.deferred_payment_instructions: By placing this order, you agree to pay later through the payment method identified by the merchant.

payment.still_pending_notice: Your payment is still being processed.
payment.title: Payment
payment.no_payment: No payment is required for this order.

errors.default: An error occurred, try again later or contact us.
errors.promocode_already_in_cart: This promo code is already applied
errors.email: Please provide a valid email address
errors.quantity_revised: Quantity has been revised due to stock limitations.
errors.quantity_out_of_stock: Unfortunately, this item is out of stock, remove it from the cart to continue.

error_payment_items_are_invalid.title: Some items in your cart are invalid
error_payment_items_are_invalid.description: Please review your order, or try again later.

card.invalid_date: The card's expiration date is invalid.
card.invalid_year: The card's expiration year is invalid.
card.invalid_month: The card's expiration month is invalid.
card.expired: The card's expiration date is passed

discounts.conflict: Some discounts cannot be combined. Use this discount instead?

domain_crawling.title: Order couldn’t be processed.
domain_crawling.description: You have not been charged. Please contact the store owner for details.

product_crawling.title: Price of products in the cart may have changed.
product_crawling.description: Try removing and adding them to your cart. Please contact the store owner for details.

stock_validation.title: Product stock unavailable.
stock_validation.description: Some products may be out of stock for selected quantity. Revise the quantity or contact the store owner for details.

custom_fields_validation.title: Missing required information.
custom_fields_validation.description: Some products in the cart are missing mandatory information. Please edit the cart to continue.

shipping_validation.title: Shipping method couldn't be validated.
shipping_validation.description: The selected shipping rate might have changed or is unavailable. Please contact the store owner for details.

account_configuration.title: No shipping method is currently available
account_configuration.description: Try again later, or contact us for support.

rates_calculation.title: Unable to calculate shipping for your order
rates_calculation.description: Try again later, or contact us for support.

no_rates_found.title: No shipping methods are available for your order
no_rates_found.description: Please review your shipping address or contact us.

payment_failed.title: Unable to process payment
payment_failed.description: Try again later, or contact us for support.

payment_authorization.title: Unable to process payment
payment_authorization.default: Please review billing and payment information.

failed.title: Unable to process payment
failed.description: We have not been able to authenticate your payment information. Please try again

errors.customer_password_token_expired: Your password recovery token has expired.
errors.customer_password_token_invalid: Your password recovery token is invalid.
errors.customer_not_found: The email address is not associated with any account.

confirmation.async_confirmation_notice: Your order has been placed and is currently processing. You will receive a confirmation shortly.

checkout.shipping_taxes_calculated_when_address_p: Shipping and taxes will be calculated after an address is provided.
